segments.text: Honey , why are you so angry ? Can you tell me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don ’ t love me , Roy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you say such words ? I love you very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you used to be . But not now . You are in love with someone else . You are in love with my friend , Janet . You appreciate her very much . You think she is beautiful and fun to be with and you think I ’ m dumb and uninteresting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Susan , just one last week I went out to have a lunch with her . There is nothing for you to be jealous about . I like your company much better than Janet ’ s .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I envy her and also I hate her at the same time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honey , you should know that I love you so deeply .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But honey , I think you ’ re terrific . There is nothing ...
segments.speaker: S1
